DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether PF-04383119 effective treatment pain associate interstitial cystitis .
DOC.brief_title: An Effectiveness Safety Study PF-04383119 Treatment Pain Interstitial Cystitis
DOC.criteria: Male female adult least 18 year age ; Moderate severe interstitial cystitis , mean pain intensity score predefined level . Less 6 month since onset interstitial cystitis symptom ; History recurrent urinary tract infection , genitourinary cancer ; History hepatitis B , C human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) ; Use certain drug give bladder 1 month prior study entry .
